CustomField.formula: IF ( Risk_Rating_Calculation__c <= 3 , IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Jpg&versionId=0685G00000NXcKw&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5G00001aScfZ","No Action",35,100), IF ( Risk_Rating_Calculation__c < 7, IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Jpg&versionId=0685G00000NXcKx&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5G00001aScfe","Monitor",35,100), IF ( Risk_Rating_Calculation__c < 13, IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Jpg&versionId=0685G00000NXcL1&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5G00001aScfj","Action",35,100), IF ( Risk_Rating_Calculation__c < 16, IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Jpg&versionId=0685G00000NXcLB&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5G00001aScft","Urgent Action",35,120), IF ( Risk_Rating_Calculation__c < 26, IMAGE("/sfc/servlet.shepherd/version/renditionDownload?rendition=ORIGINAL_Jpg&versionId=0685G00000NXcL2&operationContext=CHATTER&contentId=05T5G00001aScau","Stop",35,100), '' )))))
CustomField.label: Risk Rating Score
